channel.title: Comments on: Geometric Optics – hitting complexity first
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/05/08/geometric-optics-hitting-complexity-first/#comment-66">pshircliff</a>.
I haven't, but it sounds delicious! I see it as a good way to get them creating, exploring, and testing at home,
item.content:encoded:
In reply to pshircliff.

I haven’t, but it sounds delicious! I see it as a good way to get them creating, exploring, and testing at home,

item.title: By: Jacob
item.dc:creator: Jacob
item.description:
Totally agree with your approach and appreciate you taking the time to document it. Love it!
Here's something in the same vein: http://martensvsb.wordpress.com/2012/04/12/putting-understanding-first/
item.content:encoded:
